Trade/Device Name(s): Optilite Freelite Mx Kappa Free Kit
Optilite Freelite Mx Lambda Free Kit
Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulin (light chain specific) immunological test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Optilite Freelite Mx Kappa and Lambda Free Kits for quantitative measurement of free light chains in serum and urine using turbidimetric assay
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative in vitro measurement of kappa and lambda free light chains in serum and urine to aid in diagnosis and monitoring of multiple myeloma, lymphocytic neoplasms, Waldenström’s macroglobulinaemia, AL amyloidosis, light chain deposition disease, and connective tissue diseases such as systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), in conjunction with other laboratory and clinical findings
